author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...SMALL HURRICANE HENRIETTE EXPECTED TO WEAKEN FURTHER WHILE MOVING OVER THE CENTRAL NORTH PACIFIC...
summary: ...SMALL HURRICANE HENRIETTE EXPECTED TO WEAKEN FURTHER WHILE MOVING OVER THE CENTRAL NORTH PACIFIC... As of 11:00 PM HST Mon Aug 11 the center of Henriette was located near 31.7, -160.1 with movement NW at 16 mph. The minimum central pressure was 990 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 75 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Henriette (CP3/EP082025)
